title: Apple Inc. stock rises Wednesday, still underperforms market
text:
Shares of Apple Inc. 
        AAPL,
        -1.06%
       inched 0.57% higher to $186.19 Wednesday, on what proved to be an all-around great trading session for the stock market, with the NASDAQ Composite Index 
        COMP,
        -0.12%
       rising 0.75% to 14,969.65 and the Dow Jones Industrial Average 
        DJIA,
        +0.12%
       rising 0.45% to 37,695.73. Apple Inc. closed $13.43 below its 52-week high ($199.62), which the company achieved on December 14th. The stock underperformed when compared to some of its competitors Wednesday, as Microsoft Corp. 
        MSFT,
        -0.17%
       rose 1.86% to $382.77, Alphabet Inc. Cl C 
        GOOG,
        +0.21%
       rose 0.87% to $143.80, and Alphabet Inc. Cl A 
        GOOGL,
        +0.04%
       rose 0.94% to $142.28. Trading volume (45.8 M) remained 8.1 million below its 50-day average volume of 53.9 M.
